name: La Pelle de Cthulhu - The Crawl of Cthulhu
name_original: La Pelle de Cthulhu - The Crawl of Cthulhu
description:
Here is our game for Mini Jame Gam #15 : The Crawl of Cthulhu.

A sad and lonely zombie is approched by a mysterious shovel who whispers promises to him. " You will never be alone". Thanks to the powers of the shovel, he can wake the dead. It only remains for him to escape from the village, expanding his army on his way. If he manages to get out of the village with his new friends, the world will be theirs. But the Guards and the Priest are ready to do anything to stop them.

Features :

  • Command an army of zombies companions with your mighty shovel !
  • Grow your ranks with the bodies of your enemies ...
  • Conquer the village and face the mighty Priest !

Controls :

  • ZQSD/WASD : Move around
  • Right Click : Order your zombies to attack a target
  • E : Raise a zombie from the corpse of an enemy
  • Left Click : Strike with your shovel
  • Left Shift : Dash towards your cursor

Credits :

  • Koya (art) (@kenzakoya)
  • Sovcenko (code)
  • External assets used : All in 1 VFX Toolkit by Seaside Studios, Universal Sound FX by Imphenzia, SC Post Effects by Staggart Creations, Unity standards assets
